ac: 20, touch 15, flat-footed 16 (+4 armor, +3 Dex, +1 dodge, +1 shield, +1 size)
special_attacks: combat style (two-weapon), favored enemy (animals +2, humans +4), swarming
other_gear: mithral chain shirt, +1 composite longbow (+2 Str) with 20 arrows, +1/mwk two-bladed sword, cloak of resistance +1, 149 gp
feats: Dodge, Endurance, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (two-bladed sword), Improved Two-Weapon Fighting, Two-Weapon Defense, Two-Weapon Fighting, Weapon Focus (two-bladed sword)

sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Ratfolk/Example Ratfolk/Ratfolk Scroungers/Ratfolk Expedition Leader/Ratfolk Sage

sections.body: Magic is most useful to the warren when it provides insight, so diviners are held in high regard. Though the ratfolk sage prepares some offensive spells in case of attack—it's always good to be ready for danger—such things can be duplicated with alchemy and weaponry.

sections.name: Ratfolk Sage

special_qualities: favored terrain (desert +4, urban +2), hunter's bond (companions), surface sprinter*, swift tracker, track +4, wild empathy +7, woodland stride
name: Ratfolk Expedition Leader
skills: Climb +9, Craft (alchemy) +3, Handle Animal +6, Heal +8, Knowledge (dungeoneering, geography, nature) +8, Perception +14, Ride +10, Spellcraft +6, Stealth +18, Survival +12, Swim +7
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Ratfolk/Example Ratfolk/Ratfolk Scroungers/Ratfolk Expedition Leader
combat_gear: oil of magic weapon, potion of cure serious wounds
